annotation.spannedText: People who choose not to vaccinate their children against infectious diseases are putting not only their own children at risk, but also other people's children

annotation.spannedText: They will say that I'm not a scientist (I am), and that I'm an "Agent 666" (I don't know what that is, but I'm pretty sure that I'm not one)
